headline: Here's Why Broadridge Financial Solutions (BR) is a Strong Growth Stock
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.

headline: Rimes Appoints Vijay Mayadas as President and Chief Executive Officer
summary: Rimes, a leading provider of enterprise data management and investment platform solutions to the global investment community, is pleased to announce the appointment of Vijay Mayadas as President and Chief Executive Officer. Mayadas, a seasoned FinTech executive with a track record of scaling global businesses and driving innovation in financial markets, succeeds Brad Hunt, who will assume the role of Vice Chair, Rimes Board of Directors.

headline: Is Broadridge Financial Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: As Broadridge Financial has lagged behind the broader Nasdaq Composite over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain cautious about the stock’s prospects.
